imdb.plot outline: 18 years after the death of playwright and director Hanoch Levin comes an expansive series that recounts his personal and artistic biography in four chapters. Levin was one of Israel's greatest playwrights - a sharp, witty, cruel mind - and a rare truth-teller, who expressed what Israelis dared not tell themselves.
imdb.title: Hanoch Levin - A Life We've Never Seen Before
plot: 18 years after the death of playwright and director Hanoch Levin comes an expansive series that recounts his personal and artistic biography in four chapters. Levin was one of Israel's greatest playwrights - a sharp, witty, cruel mind - and a rare truth-teller, who expressed what Israelis dared not tell themselves.
